subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Blues extended their N.H.L.-best winning streak to seven games, and Vladimir Tarasenko stretched his goal-scoring streak to four games in a 4-3 victory over the Devils.
snippet: The Blues extended their N.H.L.-best winning streak to seven games, and Vladimir Tarasenko stretched his goal-scoring streak to four games in a 4-3 victory over the Devils.
